item.description:
Meet some local urban hens and Khrysti Smyth of Yardbirds!

Keeping hens in an urban backyard is both fun and practical for urban dwellers interested in fresh eggs or just experimenting with small-scale chicken keeping!

Khrysti will give a presentation on everything you need to know about getting started with keeping backyard hens in the city and coop set up.

There will be plenty of time for Q & A, plus meeting a few feathered friends.

This is a ticketed event. Pre-register, as space is limited: http://relish6-13-13.eventbrite.com/ $15
item.name: Backyard chickens 101 (ticketed)
